articles.author: Terrence McCoy, Marina Dias
articles.title: Brazil charges Bolsonaro with leading plot to seize power, kill rivals - The Washington Post
articles.description: Former president Jair Bolsonaro is accused of plotting the assassination of political rivals and a military takeover of Latin America’s largest country.
articles.content: RIO DE JANEIRO Former Brazilian president Jair Bolsonaro was charged Tuesday evening with leading an extensive plot to overthrow the Brazilian government following his 2022 electoral loss, a historic… [+4854 chars]

articles.author: Scott Neuman
articles.title: Is Trump preparing to cancel America's ride back to the moon? - NPR
articles.description: President Trump launched the Artemis program to return U.S. astronauts to the moon for the first time since Apollo. Now, the plan could be a casualty of the cost-cutting drive overseen by Elon Musk.
articles.content: A lunar rock sample collected in 1972 by Apollo 17 the final U.S. moon mission once held a place of honor on a shelf in President Joe Biden's Oval Office. It was a gift from NASA, meant to symbolize … [+7845 chars]

articles.title: Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, unveils new lifestyles brand As Ever - The Associated Press
articles.description: Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, has rebranded her fledgling company to As Ever. The news Monday comes just weeks after restarting her social media life under a new handle on Instagram. She teased her American Riviera Orchard last year with jars of preserves. T…
articles.content: MONTECITO, Calif. (AP) Au revoir, American Riviera Orchard. Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, has rebranded her fledgling company to As Ever just weeks after restarting her social media life under a new… [+2717 chars]
